name: Pathfinder RPG Name Generator
description: Struggling to come up with the perfect moniker for your Pathfinder character? Fear not, adventurer! Our generator conjures up names worthy of bards' tales and dragon's hoards. Get ready to embark on epic quests with a name as legendary as your deeds!
introduction: Welcome, brave hero, to the Pathfinder RPG Name Generator! Whether you're crafting a cunning rogue, a valiant knight, or a wise wizard, a great name is the first step on your journey. We've delved into the lore and legends of Pathfinder to bring you a treasure trove of naming inspiration. Prepare to be amazed!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold! A brand new, totally awesome Pathfinder name will appear as if summoned by the gods themselves.
Feeling picky? Keep clicking! We've got more names than a goblin has teeth (and that's saying something!).
Don't like the results? No problem! Tweak the prefixes and suffixes to your liking or just keep hitting generate until you find the perfect fit.
Write down your favourite names, so you don't forget them!

faqs.question: Is this generator only for Pathfinder RPG?
faqs.answer: While it's designed with Pathfinder in mind, feel free to use these names for any fantasy setting! They're versatile enough for dungeons, dragons, and everything in between.

faqs.question: Are the generated names lore-accurate?
faqs.answer: We've drawn inspiration from Pathfinder's lore, but the generator is designed for creativity and fun. Some names might sound familiar, while others are entirely new creations.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: The generated names are free for personal use. If you intend to use them commercially (e.g., in a published game), we recommend checking for existing trademarks to be on the safe side.

faqs.question: How many names can this generator create?
faqs.answer: The possibilities are virtually endless! With our combination of prefixes and suffixes, you can generate a vast array of unique and memorable names.

faqs.question: I have a suggestion for a prefix or suffix. Can I submit it?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear from you! Contact us through our website with your suggestions, and we'll consider adding them to the generator.

faqs.question: The generated name sounds silly, is it a bug?
faqs.answer: Well, that's a matter of taste! But if you think it's really broken, please contact us and we'll take a look!
